content.metaDescription: Stunning 4-bedroom luxury villa in Portichol-Balcón al Mar, Jávea. 209m² on 1110m² plot. Sea views, modern design. €1,915,000. Contact +34 634 044 970
content.heroIntro:
Discover Villa MIR0160, an extraordinary luxury villa nestled in the prestigious Portichol - Balcón al Mar area of Jávea, where Mediterranean elegance meets contemporary sophistication. This exceptional 4-bedroom, 5-bathroom residence spans 209m² of meticulously designed living space on an expansive 1110m² private plot, offering the perfect sanctuary for discerning buyers seeking the ultimate Costa Blanca lifestyle.

Priced at €1,915,000, this architectural masterpiece by renowned developer Miralbo Urbana represents more than just a home – it's your gateway to the coveted Jávea lifestyle. With panoramic views, premium finishes, and an enviable location just moments from pristine beaches and vibrant town amenities, Villa MIR0160 promises an unparalleled living experience in one of Spain's most sought-after coastal destinations.

locationSection.intro:
Portichol - Balcón al Mar represents the epitome of exclusive coastal living in Jávea, offering residents a perfect blend of tranquility and accessibility. This prestigious neighborhood is renowned for its elevated position providing breathtaking panoramic views over the Mediterranean Sea, while maintaining easy access to Jávea's golden beaches, world-class restaurants, and vibrant cultural scene.

The area's strategic location places you within walking distance of the historic Jávea old town with its traditional Spanish charm, yet close enough to modern amenities including premium golf courses, luxury marinas, and the cosmopolitan atmosphere that has made the Costa Blanca a magnet for international residents and investors.
highlights: Walking distance to Arenal Beach and Granadella Beach - two of Costa Blanca's most beautiful coves
5 minutes to Jávea's historic old town with authentic Spanish restaurants and weekly markets
Easy access to premium golf courses including Jávea Golf Club and La Sella Golf Resort
Close proximity to Puerto de Jávea marina with luxury yacht facilities and waterfront dining
Excellent connectivity to Alicante Airport (90km) and Valencia Airport (100km) for international travel

propertyFeatures.intro: Villa MIR0160 showcases contemporary architectural excellence with every detail carefully crafted to enhance the Mediterranean lifestyle. The intelligent design maximizes natural light and sea breezes while creating seamless indoor-outdoor living spaces perfect for year-round enjoyment.
features: 4 spacious bedrooms including ground floor master suite with private terrace access
5 luxury bathrooms with premium fixtures and modern design elements
Open-plan living area with floor-to-ceiling windows maximizing natural light
State-of-the-art kitchen with premium appliances and sleek contemporary finishes
Private swimming pool surrounded by landscaped Mediterranean gardens
Multiple outdoor terraces and entertainment areas with panoramic sea views
Premium air conditioning and heating systems throughout
High-end security system with video surveillance and alarm
Private covered parking for multiple vehicles
Energy-efficient design with modern insulation and LED lighting

content.investmentSection:
Villa MIR0160 represents an exceptional investment opportunity in one of Europe's most stable and growing luxury property markets. The Costa Blanca continues to attract international buyers seeking premium lifestyle properties, with Jávea consistently ranking among the most desirable locations for both permanent residence and holiday home investment. The combination of Spain's favorable tax environment, excellent healthcare system, and year-round Mediterranean climate ensures strong long-term capital appreciation potential.

The luxury villa rental market in Jávea generates substantial returns for property owners, with high-end properties like Villa MIR0160 commanding premium weekly rates during peak season. The growing trend toward remote work and lifestyle migration has increased demand for luxury properties with office spaces and modern connectivity, positioning this villa perfectly for both personal enjoyment and rental income generation.
whyBuySection: Prime location in exclusive Portichol - Balcón al Mar with guaranteed privacy and tranquility
Turnkey luxury property with premium finishes and modern amenities ready for immediate enjoyment
Strong investment potential in one of Costa Blanca's most sought-after residential areas
Exceptional build quality by renowned developer Miralbo Urbana with full warranty coverage
Year-round Mediterranean climate perfect for outdoor living and entertaining
Growing international community with excellent English-speaking services and amenities
Easy access to world-class beaches, golf courses, and cultural attractions of the Costa Blanca

faqs.question: What is the total price and what payment terms are available?
faqs.answer: Villa MIR0160 is priced at €1,915,000. We can arrange flexible payment schedules and connect you with mortgage specialists through our Habeno partnership for financing options up to 70% of the property value for qualified international buyers.

faqs.question: What makes the Portichol - Balcón al Mar location special?
faqs.answer: This exclusive area of Jávea offers elevated sea views, privacy, and tranquility while being just minutes from beaches, restaurants, and amenities. It's considered one of the most prestigious residential zones on the Costa Blanca with excellent capital appreciation potential.

faqs.question: What is included in the villa purchase price?
faqs.answer: The price includes the fully finished villa with premium kitchen appliances, air conditioning, swimming pool, landscaped gardens, private parking, security systems, and all fixtures and fittings as specified. Furniture packages can be arranged separately.

faqs.question: Can you help arrange a mortgage for international buyers?
faqs.answer: Yes, through our partnership with Habeno, we provide access to competitive Spanish mortgage products for international buyers. Financing up to 70% is typically available for qualified applicants with terms up to 25 years.

faqs.question: What is the rental potential for this property?
faqs.answer: Luxury villas in this area of Jávea generate excellent rental returns, typically €3,000-5,000 per week in peak season. The combination of location, amenities, and build quality makes it highly attractive to premium vacation rental market.

faqs.question: When will the villa be ready for occupation?
faqs.answer: Villa MIR0160 is a new construction project by Miralbo Urbana. Completion timelines and exact handover dates will be confirmed upon contract signing, typically 12-18 months from purchase agreement.

faqs.question: What are the ongoing costs of owning this property?
faqs.answer: Annual costs include property tax (IBI) approximately €2,000-3,000, community fees if applicable, utilities, insurance, and optional property management services. We provide detailed cost breakdowns during the viewing process.

faqs.question: How can I arrange a viewing of Villa MIR0160?
faqs.answer: Contact us via WhatsApp at the provided link, call +34 634 044 970, or use our online booking system. We offer both in-person and virtual viewing options, and can arrange airport transfers for serious buyers visiting from abroad.

faqs.question: What legal support is available for the purchase process?
faqs.answer: We work with experienced English-speaking legal professionals who specialize in Spanish property law for international buyers. They handle all legal aspects including due diligence, contract review, and completion procedures.

faqs.question: Are there any restrictions on foreign ownership?
faqs.answer: No, there are no restrictions on foreign nationals owning property in Spain. EU and non-EU citizens have the same property ownership rights, making the purchase process straightforward for international buyers.

content.conclusion: Villa MIR0160 offers a rare opportunity to own a piece of paradise in one of Costa Blanca's most exclusive locations. Don't miss your chance to secure this exceptional luxury property in the heart of Jávea's most prestigious residential area. Contact us today via WhatsApp, call +34 634 044 970, or explore our mortgage options through Habeno to begin your journey toward Mediterranean luxury living.
